notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: L.B., A.F.B. and M.F.A.B. conceived and designed the experiments; R.B.F.A., I.M.A.S. and C.A.S, performed the experiments and analyzed the data; P.B.A., T.S.S. and P.C.L.N., isolated calamusenone and analyzed the chemical composition of the essential oils; R.B.F.A., L.B., A.F.B., P.C.L.N. and M.F.A.B wrote or contributed to the writing of the manuscript.
